name: TANGLEWOOD®
description: TANGLEWOOD® is a brand new and original puzzle-platforming game originally released for the SEGA Mega Drive and Genesis, coming soon to Windows, Mac, and Linux. A true 16-bit, challenging platforming experience that will make fans of the golden gaming era feel warm and fuzzy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Dual Core 1.8ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Storage: 50 MB available space
